description: This file defines the PrivacyActivity class in an Android app, which displays a local Privacy Policy HTML page within a WebView. It manages WebView settings, toolbar setup, and menu actions.

classes.name: PrivacyActivity
classes.description: An Android AppCompatActivity that displays a local privacy policy HTML page in a WebView with restricted settings. It also sets up the toolbar and menu for navigation and settings.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up the WebView with local HTML content, configures the toolbar, and restricts WebView settings for security.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the menu resource to add options to the activity's app bar.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item selections; navigates to SettingsActivity if the settings option is selected.
